thread.title: Hollyoaks death, wedding and stalker twist: 10 big spoilers revealed
thread.title_full: Hollyoaks death, wedding and stalker twist: 10 big spoilers revealed

author: Duncan Lindsay
title: Hollyoaks death, wedding and stalker twist: 10 big spoilers revealed
text:
(Picture: Lime Pictures) Joy is about to turn to tragedy as Hollyoaks notches up the death count again, killing off beloved character Amy Barnes in mysterious and shocking circumstances. But not before they at least allow her one day of joy as she gets married to Ryan Knight. 
While Amy is being bumped off elsewhere, life goes on for others in the village as Scott Drinkwell and Mercedes McQueen discover a secret that could be useful against James Nightingale while Leela Lomax is asked on a date – prompting new stalker suspicions from fans no doubt!
Here is what the big Hollyoaks week holds…
10 Hollyoaks spoilers It’s the day of Amy and Ryan’s wedding and Mike returns to walk his daughter down the aisle, while Ste is on his best behaviour. Leela is bemused when DS Armstrong asks her out on a date. Amy doubts her plans to move abroad when she overhears Ste reading to the kids. Mercedes and Scott break into James’ house and discover tapes of his acting auditions to use against him. Amy and Ryan’s plans cause disharmony and an explosive row unfolds. Mercedes and Scott get a bidder when they try and sell James’ court wigs. Life will never be the same again when Amy is found dead. James finds incriminating evidence which proves that he has been burgled. News of Amy’s death spreads and Scott is hurt that no-one thought to tell him. Zack reaches out to an upset Leah. Monday 27th March (Picture: Lime Pictures) 
It’s the day of Amy and Ryan’s wedding and there’s joy all round as Ryan gets emotional watching his bride walk up the aisle. As they become man and wife, Mike commends Ste on his impeccable behaviour and warns him to mess up.
James warns Mercedes and Scott that they need to pay him back or they will report them to the police.
Tuesday 28th March Amy questions her decision to move to America with Ryan when she spends time with the kids and Ste. Later, as her and Ryan’s plans cause tension, a row looks set to explode.
(Picture: Lime Pictures) Mercedes and Scott break into James’ flat to steal stuff to sell in order to pay him back. They hit the jackpot when they discover tapes of him auditioning for his drama society at law school.
Wednesday 29th March Diane and Tony are disturbed by a noise and they make a grim discovery. Someone has something to hide. Mike finds Ryan in The Loft. A devastating discovery changes life forever – Amy is dead but what has happened to her?
Thursday 30th March (Picture: Lime Pictures) News spreads about Amy’s death and Scott is hurt that no-one thought to tell him directly when Tegan mentions what has happened. Ryan and the kids’ lives have been turned upside down – could Ste be to blame?
James finds evidence that he has been burgled when he returns to his flat and Mercedes and Scott get a bite when they put one of James’ court wigs up for sale.
Friday 31st March Leah and Lucas run away as the grief takes hold and Leela and Zak team up to try and find them. Zack reaches out to Leah.
Amy’s death continues to send shockwaves around the village as more questions are asked.
